评论详情: My only gripe is the low rise, but that is a personal preference and it is advertised as such, so it shouldn't be a surprise when you receive them. Otherwise, I love these pants. They are comfortable, a great color and the length is great if you're tall. I have a 32.5" inseam and consistently struggle finding pants long enough. I've even paired these with boots and they looked great.
These give a cowgirl look. They don't fit as tight as I would like for them to at the top. Still a nice pair of jeans. True to size
My go to jeans- comfortable ordered my size and they fit fine. They have a stretch to them that is and are light weight but I still think well made. I love them.

I absolutely love these jeans! They are very cute! The blue-green color option is beautiful and gives a stylish and brings back my 90s vibe without looking outdated. They pants themselves run a little large, so I wish I had sized down for a better fit. My regular jean size and my current measurements lined up to their size chart for an XXL but an XL would have fit much better. They don't fall down, but the waist is a bit looser than I'd like. For this style the longer baggier legs is intentional but if you're on the shorter side the length may be a bit excessive for you. Despite this minor sizing issue the overall quality and style are impressive. I plan to purchase more in a smaller size and different colors because they are really great!

I am really picky about my pants as I like them fairly tight with looser legging.  I NEVER order them off the internet for that reason.  I was surprised that not only did these fit, but they looked decent as well.  The didn't appear as baggy around the calves as pictured, but I'm not a small lady either which might account for the difference.  I'm a decent size 15 and I ordered large and found these fit a little tight, but not uncomfortably so.  These are not very low rise, but more mid rise on me and I have plenty of butt that normally pulls up the slack.  Overall, a decent set of jeans that appear well made and washed up great.  No complaints.  At the present price of $39.77 + 10% coupon, they seem with in fair market value.
I didn't care for the actual color and the fit was just horrid. I go at least a size down

These jeans are pretty good overall! The fit was as expected—I’m 5’7", 165 lbs, and the size large fit well. The light blue color matches the photos perfectly, which I appreciated.  That said, I wouldn’t call them true low-rise jeans; they’re more of a mid-rise fit. Also, they have some stretch, so they do become a bit baggy with wear. If you’re okay with that, they’re still a comfortable and stylish option.

I was very excited that these pants fit me so nicely! The are long so I will need to shorten them. I am 5 feet and about 115 pounds. I got a small and they fit quite well. They are soft and I like the color. The flair in the leg starts low so when I shorten them I may lose some of the style, but I am hoping not too much.

评论概述: These Jeans Will Not Waist Your Time
评论详情: Do you want a pair of jeans that feels and look great, are super comfortable and have a great fit? Look no more. I ordered these jeans for my wife and she thinks this pair is great. Coming from my wife, who is a little particular about her clothes and who usually does not wear jeans, this is a big compliment. She has a hard time searching for the perfect pair of jeans. She can wear these all day without any issues of heaviness or bother. The fabric is lightweight and breathable.  She loves the jeans style, fit and looks. I ordered light blue for her and she likes the color very much. The salient feature of the jeans that she absolutely loves is the youthful look and fit. It gives her a contemporary appearance and it has a slimming effect on her that she appreciates; most importantly to her, it does not make her look frumpy. She thinks people of any age can wear these jeans without looking out of place in them.  The length is just perfect and these allow her to wear them with sneakers, flats or small heels. She ordered them large and they are a tad loose in the waist (which she has remedied with a belt) which is better for her, but if you prefer really tight jeans then you should perhaps consider a size down. She does not mind a little fold in the thighs and the waist to be a little loose. Be aware that the pockets are not too deep (for example your phone almost do not fit in the back pocket) which is not an issue for her because according to her anything in the pockets make her look bigger. She also says these jeans seem to be well constructed and she thinks she will have them for a number of years. These are certainly not a big brand name like some other jeans, but they have shot to the top of her list when it comes time for her to get another pair.

评论概述: Really Long and Not Super Low Rise
评论详情: Overall, I like these jeans.  They're comfortable. The material is pretty soft for jeans, and they do have the perfect amount of stretch in them.  I ordered the dark blue, and they aren't the same as the picture--which is one of the reasons I only gave them 4 stars. The dark blue is more of a dirty blue, and it doesn't have the variation in it that is shown in the picture. That was pretty disappointing because I hate jeans that look dirty before you ever wear them.  These are labeled as low-rise. I'd say they're more of a mid-rise.  They're also really long--dragging on the ground long. If you are above average height, these will be a good length for you. If you're shorter than 5'7", these will probably be a little long on you.  I haven't washed these yet, but I think they'll probably shrink some if you dry them. I'm hoping this helps the length.  I'd order these again, but I wouldn't order this wash, and I'd probably size down based on the length and the stretchiness of the waist.

Do you think these pants look good on me? I don't think so. The low waist allows my belly to hang over. Notice I have an apple shape. I have a curvy middle with narrow hips. These pants might look better on a pear-shaped person. They are very long, and I am wearing high-heel shoes so they don't drag on the ground. If you are not a tall person, you will probably have to hem them up.

These Jeans for Women, featuring a Denim Flare Leg style, are a fantastic throwback to the Y2K and '90s vintage aesthetic. The low-rise fit adds a classic retro vibe, making them perfect for those who love the nostalgia of that era. The denim is soft yet durable, providing a comfortable fit while maintaining that timeless denim look. The flare leg design gives these jeans a flattering silhouette that pairs beautifully with everything from crop tops to oversized sweaters. The vintage wash adds to their nostalgic charm, making them a great choice for both casual outings and dressed-up occasions. Whether you're going for a laid-back, throwback look or mixing them with modern styles, these denim pants are versatile, stylish, and a must-have for any wardrobe!

I love these jeans! The AI tried recommending a M to me, but I typically wear a L in bottoms, so I checked their size chart... My waist is 29" and my hips are 41", so it really could've gone either way. I decided to order the L, and it fits perfectly. The waistband does come away from my back when I sit or bend over, but when I'm standing/walking, it looks good because it fits just right without squishing my love handles. It does have good/comfortable stretch to it though, so a M likely would've fit me fine, too. The length is amazing - just right for wearing shoes with a little bit of heel on them (I'm 5'6"). I'm so happy with these jeans that I'm thinking of buying more to continue enjoying in future years.

they rent very baggy on me, im a bit more on the curvy side but im tall and these jeans have a nice length on them. the fabric is stitched and dyed well but its fairly thin for a jean. I like them overall and I think they look nice on.
Fit well and  good material. We ordered others for my 14 yoa daughter.  She is very picky but  this one fit and feel the best . She likes it.

These jeans are reminiscent of my college days. The reviews are mixed on the rise. Whether they’re “low rise” for you will greatly depend on your body type and torso length. I’m curvy with a short torso and long legs so these are low rise for me but the length isn’t as long as in the pictures. I’m just under 5’7 and the curves take up some real estate as well. Still they break at the shoe so they’re long enough for flats or sneakers. They have a little stretch and the waist fits with no gapping. The material is kind of thin but they still feel like jeans. Standard blue wash.
I got them for my daughter for her christmas gift and I looked  at the measurements too but they didn't fit her right.
Low rise should not come over my belly button. Faulty advertisement. Sizing was a bit big but the cut is awful
These do fit great and look great but they are absolutely not even remotely close to low rise. They're mid rise at best, sitting about an inch below my belly button.

评论概述: Decent Fit, Good Look, Poor Fabric Quality?
评论详情: I like these jeans a lot. Love the color, and they are very comfortable to wear, although I do find that they slip down a lot around the waist so I'm often pulling them up throughout the day. I don't mind that so much because seriously, they are COMFORTABLE everywhere, but the very first time I wore them, the back belt loop ripped off the waist, leaving a hole in the fabric behind. I took a look at the other back belt loop, and I think the thread used to sew these is actually stronger than the denim itself. In the third photo, you can see how the bottom of the belt loop is pulling away from the fabric, so I'm pretty sure it's only a matter of time before this one rips, too. I did some quick sewing to mend the hole and reattach the belt loop just below the seam on the waistline (which I'm hoping is a stronger spot), but it's a real shame when something brand new is so flimsy. I miss when clothes were made to last...

These jeans are super cute. Love the bottom hem and style on them. They fit true to size and are very stretchy comfortable jean material. Good quality. The back pockets are smaller and do give the appearance of a larger backside but not terrible.

These jeans are a great color and have enough stretch in them that they can fit a lot of body types. They are low waisted so you do have to worry a little bit about underwear showing if you are not wearing appropriate underwear. I like the thick cuff at the bottom and they are definitely long enough to be able to wear with boots. Overall a flattering and comfortable pair of jeans. The material is thick enough to feel like jeans, but with enough stretch that they are not uncomfortable.

The quality is great, it came one time, only thing was that I ordered it a size larger than I normally do because I thought it would fit better, turns out it came baggy(normal size: medium. What I ordered: large) I would recommend ordering your normal size if you want it to look like in the picture.

These are really, to really cute jeans, well made, they stretch with you, they are flattering own, I like the wide legs, they are pretty comfortable for jeans, and they are true to size. Would recommend these.
Avoid These! EMMIO's got: Pockets smaller than my patience Material worse than my morning mood Fit that's more "mom jeans" than "Y2K chic" 1/5 stars. Hard pass!

The EMMIOL Wide Leg Jeans embody a classic Y2K aesthetic, perfect for those who love vintage vibes. The light blue wash adds a refreshing touch that pairs well with a variety of tops, making it versatile for casual outings or more dressed-up occasions. These jeans have a low waist and a baggy silhouette, offering a relaxed fit that feels comfortable throughout the day. The wide leg design allows for easy movement, and the loose boyfriend style adds an effortless cool factor. Made from denim, the fabric is sturdy yet soft, providing a nice balance of durability and comfort. The material has a bit of stretch, which enhances mobility without losing shape. Overall, the comfort level is high, thanks to the loose fit. These jeans are great for all-day wear, whether you’re running errands or hanging out with friends. The baggy style also means you won’t feel constricted, making them an excellent choice for warmer weather. These jeans are incredibly versatile. They can be styled with crop tops, oversized sweaters, or fitted blouses. Add some chunky sneakers or platform boots, and you’re set for a trendy look. The EMMIOL Denim Jeans are a fantastic choice for anyone looking to embrace the Y2K fashion trend while enjoying comfort and style. With their relaxed fit and versatile design, they’re a must-have for casual wardrobes.

评论概述: This is cute but it did run a bit small
评论详情: So this didn’t fit my first daughter who I initially got it for and my second daughter took it. It is a nice tone and very cool looking jeans. It had a nice old style look to it and the material is thick and well stitched. The sizing is off and I should have gotten a size up for her but either way my other daughter fits and they are one size different from each other.
These are super comfortable they fit great they are long on me by a good bit I’m 5ft 4 but I can deal with inaccurate length for comfort

these jeans are light weight and stretchy which i like a lot! only thing was i read the reviews about sizing because i know asian sizes run smaller a but i definitely could have sized down. i wear a US 4/27 but i got a large based on prior experiences buying from emmiol

These pants are comfortable and stretchy. The fabric is of a medium weight. The company's size chart is accurate. The legs are long, as shown in website pictures. I'm a very short person however (4'10"), so they were exceedingly long on me. For your reference they were 5-1/4" as measured in bare feet with the pants just touching the floor. Also, in the website title it says the pants are low cut. In the body of the description on the website it says the pants are high cut. Just so you know, the pants are low cut, the way the pictures show. Regarding color, I got the "black" ones. I wouldn't describe them as black, or even faded black. They're more of a faded medium charcoal color. I think the pants are made well and a good quality, probably worth the $40 being charged. I need to return them because by the time I cut them to length there would be no "bell" left on the pants, and the reason I got them was for the bell, but that's no shade on the product. I'm just too short to look good in them!
cute but runs small

I chose the 5-faded denim color/style of these jeans and they are great! They look exactly like the product photo and they are super comfortable, with plenty of stretch. I am between a small and a medium and I picked the medium and they actually have a little too much room at the waistband, but it's nothing that a good belt can't fix. I particularly appreciate that these jeans are actually long enough. I'm 5'7", so not particularly tall, but I often have a problem with non-designer jeans being too short in the inseam, and that is not the case with this pair. As another reviewer commented, the back pockets of these jeans are kind of small, which I was worried about at first but they look fine once they're on. I wore these for a full day of driving yesterday and they were perfectly comfortable. I'm actually wearing them again today because they're such an easy option. I recommend these!
The right rise, and length. Back pockets are a little small
